infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: We need access to your calendar to sync your events and manage your schedule.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We need your location to add map locations to events and help you find nearby studios.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: We need your location to provide location-based features for your events.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera to take photos and record videos for your profile and portfolio.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to allow you to select and share photos for your profile, portfolio, and certificates.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app needs permission to save photos to your photo library.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to your microphone to record videos with audio for your portfolio.

plugins.photosPermission: This app needs access to your photo library to allow you to select and share photos for your profile, portfolio, and certificates.
plugins.cameraPermission: This app needs access to your camera to take photos and record videos for your profile and portfolio.
